items.text: I generate, organize and protect your documents en masse, ensuring consistency and saving time for you team
I automate your marketing and notifications so that your intenal and external clients are always up to speed
I integrate your applications and APIs into Google Workspace add-ons and web apps so that your vital business data is always at your finger tips
I built cloud-native web apps so that your tools are secure, scalable and reliable.
I streamline BI dashboards so that you can make business decisions quickly
Enhance Google Workspace add-ons with cloud databases and powerful custom APIs
I build LLM-based chatbots that communicate with your internal knowledge base in your files and databases so that you can get instant answers to your business questions.
I build Natural language to SQL chatbots that allow your teams to get insights from your internal databases without coding skills or waiting for an analyst to reply to them.
I organize and leverage your files with AI and semantic search so that it's immediately useful for your team and clients
